title: Behçet's disease
summary: Behçet's disease (BD) is a type of inflammatory disorder which affects multiple parts of the body.[2] The most common symptoms include painful mouth sores, genital sores, inflammation of parts of the eye, and arthritis.[1][2] The sores typically last a few days.[2] Less commonly there may be inflammation of the brain or spinal cord, blood clots, aneurysms, or blindness.[1][2] Often, the symptoms come and go.[1]
